quote: Don’t let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: The secret of success is to do the common things uncommonly well.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
author: Beverly Sills

quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Anonymous

quote: Good things come to people who wait, but better things come to those who go out and get them.
author: Anonymous

quote: Some people dream of accomplishing great things. Others stay awake and make it happen.
author: Anonymous

quote: You don’t always get what you wish for; you get what you work for.
author: Anonymous

quote: Challenges are what make life interesting. Overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
author: Joshua J. Marine

quote: I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: The pain you feel today is the strength you will feel tomorrow. For every challenge encountered there is opportunity for growth.
author: Anonymous
